name: taegis-xdr
label: Taegis XDR
description: SecureWorks Taegis™ XDR offers superior detection, unmatched response and an open platform built from the ground up to integrate market-leading technologies and deliver the highest ROI.

fields.name: client_id
fields.title: Client ID
fields.tooltip: Specify the Client ID as described in the Taegis Documentation. https://docs.ctpx.secureworks.com/apis/api_authenticate/
fields.description: Specify the Client ID as described in the Taegis Documentation. https://docs.ctpx.secureworks.com/apis/api_authenticate/

fields.name: client_secret
fields.title: Client Secret
fields.tooltip: Specify the Client Secret as described in the Taegis Documentation. https://docs.ctpx.secureworks.com/apis/api_authenticate/
fields.description: Specify the Client Secret as described in the Taegis Documentation. https://docs.ctpx.secureworks.com/apis/api_authenticate/

fields.name: environment
fields.title: Environment
fields.tooltip: Specify the Environment to utilize Secureworks Taegis XDR. Server URL changes with change in Environment.
fields.description: Specify the Environment to utilize Secureworks Taegis XDR. Server URL changes with change in Environment.

fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Create Investigation
operations.description: Creates investigation fields based on the descriptions of investigations and other input parameters specified.

parameters.name: description
parameters.title: Description of Investigation
parameters.tooltip: Specify a description for the specified investigation.
parameters.description: Specify a description for the specified investigation.

parameters.name: key_findings
parameters.title: Key Findings
parameters.tooltip: Specify the key findings for the specified investigation.
parameters.description: Specify the key findings for the specified investigation.

parameters.name: priority
parameters.title: Investigation's Priority
parameters.tooltip: Specify the priority of the investigation in the range 1-5 for the specified investigation.
parameters.description: Specify the priority of the investigation in the range 1-5 for the specified investigation.

parameters.name: status
parameters.title: Investigation's Status
parameters.tooltip: Specify the status of Investigation. You can choose 'Active,Awaiting Action,Closed: Authorized Activity,Closed: Confirmed Security Incident,Closed: False Positive Alert,Closed: Inconclusive,Closed: Informational,Closed: Not Vulnerable,Closed: Threat Mitigated,Open,Suspended'
parameters.description: Specify the status of Investigation. You can choose 'Active,Awaiting Action,Closed: Authorized Activity,Closed: Confirmed Security Incident,Closed: False Positive Alert,Closed: Inconclusive,Closed: Informational,Closed: Not Vulnerable,Closed: Threat Mitigated,Open,Suspended'

parameters.name: assignee_id
parameters.title: Assignee ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify The ID of the user to whom this investigation is to be assigned.
parameters.description: Specify The ID of the user to whom this investigation is to be assigned.

parameters.name: alerts
parameters.title: Alert ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the Alert which is to be added.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the Alert which is to be added.

operations.title: Get Investigations
operations.description: Retrieves a list of investigations filter asset state, CQL Query, and other input parameters specified.

parameters.name: query
parameters.title: Query
parameters.tooltip: Specify the query to utilize when searching investigations.
parameters.description: Specify the query to utilize when searching investigations.

parameters.name: orderByField
parameters.title: Order By Field
parameters.tooltip: Specify the query to utilize when searching investigations.
parameters.description: Specify the query to utilize when searching investigations.

parameters.name: orderDirection
parameters.title: Order Direction
parameters.tooltip: Select the order in which the assets are listed.By Default, It retrieves the assets in Ascending order.
parameters.description: Select the order in which the assets are listed.By Default, It retrieves the assets in Ascending order.

parameters.name: page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which you want to fetch the investigations.
parameters.description: Specify the page number from which you want to fetch the investigations.

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.title: Per Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of investigations to be shown per page. You can specify a maximum value of 100.
parameters.description: Specify the number of investigations to be shown per page. You can specify a maximum value of 100.

operations.title: Get Investigations Alerts
operations.description: Retrieves a list of alerts associated with an investigation based on the investigation ID and other input parameters specified.

parameters.name: investigation_id
parameters.title: Investigation ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the investigation in which you want to add an Event.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the investigation in which you want to add an Event.

parameters.name: page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which you want to fetch the investigations.
parameters.description: Specify the page number from which you want to fetch the investigations.

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.title: Per Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of investigations to be shown per page. You can specify a maximum value of 100.
parameters.description: Specify the number of investigations to be shown per page. You can specify a maximum value of 100.

operations.title: Update Investigation
operations.description: Updates investigation fields based on the investigation ID and other input parameters specified.

parameters.name: investigation_id
parameters.title: Investigation ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the investigation whose fields you want to update.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the investigation whose fields you want to update.

parameters.name: description
parameters.title: Description of Investigation
parameters.tooltip: Specify a description to update for the specified investigation.
parameters.description: Specify a description to update for the specified investigation.

parameters.name: key_findings
parameters.title: Key Findings
parameters.tooltip: Specify the key findings to update for the specified investigation.
parameters.description: Specify the key findings to update for the specified investigation.

parameters.name: priority
parameters.title: Investigation's Priority
parameters.tooltip: Specify the priority of the investigation in the range 1-5 to update in the specified investigation.
parameters.description: Specify the priority of the investigation in the range 1-5 to update in the specified investigation.

parameters.name: status
parameters.title: Investigation's Status
parameters.tooltip: Specify the status of Investigation. You can choose 'Active,Awaiting Action,Closed: Authorized Activity,Closed: Confirmed Security Incident,Closed: False Positive Alert,Closed: Inconclusive,Closed: Informational,Closed: Not Vulnerable,Closed: Threat Mitigated,Open,Suspended'
parameters.description: Specify the status of Investigation. You can choose 'Active,Awaiting Action,Closed: Authorized Activity,Closed: Confirmed Security Incident,Closed: False Positive Alert,Closed: Inconclusive,Closed: Informational,Closed: Not Vulnerable,Closed: Threat Mitigated,Open,Suspended'

parameters.name: assignee_id
parameters.title: Assignee ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify The ID of the user to whom this investigation is to be assigned.
parameters.description: Specify The ID of the user to whom this investigation is to be assigned.

operations.title: Unarchive Investigation
operations.description: Unarchives investigation based on the investigation ID.

parameters.name: investigation_id
parameters.title: Investigation ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the investigation which you want to Unarchive.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the investigation which you want to Unarchive.

operations.title: Add Alerts to Investigation
operations.description: Adds Alert to an existing investigation based on the investigation ID.

parameters.name: investigation_id
parameters.title: Investigation ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the investigation in which you want to add an Alert.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the investigation in which you want to add an Alert.

parameters.name: alerts
parameters.title: Alert ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the Alert which is to be added.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the Alert which is to be added.

operations.title: Add Events to Investigation
operations.description: Adds Events to an existing investigation based on the investigation ID.

parameters.name: investigation_id
parameters.title: Investigation ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the investigation in which you want to add an Event.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the investigation in which you want to add an Event.

parameters.name: events
parameters.title: Event ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the Event which is to be added.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the Event which is to be added.

operations.title: Create Comment
operations.description: Create a new comment in the activity log for investigation

parameters.name: investigation_id
parameters.title: Investigation ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the Investigation whose comment is to be added.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the Investigation whose comment is to be added.

parameters.name: description
parameters.title: Comment
parameters.tooltip: Specify a comment for the specified investigation.
parameters.description: Specify a comment for the specified investigation.

operations.title: Get Alerts
operations.description: Retrieves all alerts with Common Fields of Interests based on the filter query and other input parameters specified.

parameters.name: cql_query
parameters.title: CQL Query
parameters.value: FROM alert WHERE severity >= 0.6 AND status = 'OPEN' EARLIEST=-1d
parameters.tooltip: Specify the CQL query to run when searching for alerts. By default, it queries for alerts which are in OPEN state, have severity High/Critical, and were created within 1 Day. For more information on CQL query refer to Apache CQL documentation
parameters.description: Specify the CQL query to run when searching for alerts. By default, it queries for alerts which are in OPEN state, have severity High/Critical, and were created within 1 Day. For more information on CQL query refer to Apache CQL documentation

parameters.name: limit
parameters.title: Limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of Alerts to be shown per page.
parameters.description: Specify the number of Alerts to be shown per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.title: Offset
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of records to skip when retrieving the result set. For example, if your query has 500 total_results and you want the last 100 results, set Offset to 400.
parameters.description: Specify the number of records to skip when retrieving the result set. For example, if your query has 500 total_results and you want the last 100 results, set Offset to 400.

operations.title: Update Alert Status
operations.description: Adds a resolution status or modifies an existing resolution status based on the alert IDs and other input parameters specified.

parameters.name: alert_ids
parameters.title: Alert IDs
parameters.tooltip: Specify the IDs of the alerts as comma-separated values whose resolution status you want to update.
parameters.description: Specify the IDs of the alerts as comma-separated values whose resolution status you want to update.

parameters.name: resolution_status
parameters.title: Resolution Status
parameters.tooltip: Specify the resolution status you want to apply to specified alerts.
parameters.description: Specify the resolution status you want to apply to specified alerts.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.title: Reason of Status Change
parameters.tooltip: Specify a reason for updating the status of specified assets.
parameters.description: Specify a reason for updating the status of specified assets.

operations.title: Get Assets
operations.description: Retrieves a list of assets based on the filter asset state, order, and other input parameters specified.

parameters.name: filter_asset_state
parameters.title: Filter Asset State
parameters.tooltip: Select the asset state to filter the fetched assets. You can select from the following options:All,Deleted,Active,Unhealthy.By Default, All assets are fetched.
parameters.description: Select the asset state to filter the fetched assets. You can select from the following options:All,Deleted,Active,Unhealthy.By Default, All assets are fetched.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.title: Order By
parameters.tooltip: Select the criteria by which to order the assets. You can select from the following options:Hostname,IP Address,MAC Address,Tag,Username,OS Version,Endpoint Type,Created At,Updated At,Deleted At,OS Family,OS Distributor,Sensor Version.By Default, the sorting criteria is set to Hostname.
parameters.description: Select the criteria by which to order the assets. You can select from the following options:Hostname,IP Address,MAC Address,Tag,Username,OS Version,Endpoint Type,Created At,Updated At,Deleted At,OS Family,OS Distributor,Sensor Version.By Default, the sorting criteria is set to Hostname.

parameters.name: orderDirection
parameters.title: Order Direction
parameters.tooltip: Select the order in which the assets are listed.By Default, It retrieves the assets in Ascending order.
parameters.description: Select the order in which the assets are listed.By Default, It retrieves the assets in Ascending order.

parameters.name: only_most_recent
parameters.title: Only Most Recent
parameters.tooltip: Select this option to fetch only those assets which were created within the last 24 hours.
parameters.description: Select this option to fetch only those assets which were created within the last 24 hours.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.title: Limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of Assets to be shown per page.
parameters.description: Specify the number of Assets to be shown per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.title: Offset
parameters.tooltip: Specify the offset result set requested. If your query has 500 total_results and you want the last 100; use offset:400 limit:100
parameters.description: Specify the offset result set requested. If your query has 500 total_results and you want the last 100; use offset:400 limit:100

operations.title: Isolate Assets
operations.description: Isolates the asset based on the Asset ID and the isolation reason specified.

parameters.name: id
parameters.title: Asset ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the Asset which you want to isolate.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the Asset which you want to isolate.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.title: Reason of Isolation
parameters.tooltip: Specify a reason for isolation of the specified asset.
parameters.description: Specify a reason for isolation of the specified asset.

operations.title: Get User by ID
operations.description: Retrieves the state of a playbook execution based on the user and tenant ID specified.

parameters.name: id
parameters.title: User ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the user ID whose details you want to fetch.
parameters.description: Specify the user ID whose details you want to fetch.

parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.title: Tenant ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the tenant ID of which the specified user is a member.
parameters.description: Specify the tenant ID of which the specified user is a member.

operations.title: Get Endpoint
operations.description: Retrieves a RedCloak endpoint info based on the endpoint ID specified.

parameters.name: id
parameters.title: Endpoint ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the endpoint ID for which to fetch SecureWorks RedCloak™ endpoint information.
parameters.description: Specify the endpoint ID for which to fetch SecureWorks RedCloak™ endpoint information.

operations.title: Get Playbook Execution
operations.description: Retrieves the state of a playbook execution based on the playbook execution ID specified.

parameters.name: playbookExecutionId
parameters.title: Playbook Execution ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the playbook execution ID whose state you want to fetch.
parameters.description: Specify the playbook execution ID whose state you want to fetch.

operations.title: Execute Playbook
operations.description: Execute playbook in Taegis XDR system according to Playbook ID and supplied parameters

parameters.name: playbookId
parameters.title: Playbook ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify The ID of the Playbook which is to be executed.
parameters.description: Specify The ID of the Playbook which is to be executed.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.title: JSON Parameters
parameters.tooltip: JSON object of inputs to pass into the playbook execution.
parameters.description: JSON object of inputs to pass into the playbook execution.
